verbs.description: [ARG0: sluggish lakers] [V: put] on [ARG1: a dismal display in loss to raptors] they got drilled in the first falling into a 31-point deficit to the toronto raptors before the lakers showed some fight while dropping a 121 - 107 game before 18 997 sometimes disgruntled fans magic johnson basketball raptors los angeles times james kawhi lakers staples center president of basketball operations luke walton los angeles lakers
